gcci.text: H100 supply constraints ease as capex cycles mature, but lead times remain uneven across regions.

gtpi.text: API token pricing is compressing toward marginal cost amid intensified model competition and efficiency gains.

gagl.text: Grid operators confront rising peak loads from AI clusters, accelerating baseload additions and demand flexibility programs.

aipi.text: Overall industry sentiment remains cautiously bullish, with capex discipline offset by fears of a capacity overshoot.
